text:
Begum,
Tumhare bina toh main campus life k baare mein soch b nahi sakta. Tere room mein Games khelna, movies dekhna, mastii karnaa. kahin b ghumne jana ho ya kuch b mastii karni ho. Mera jab bhi  Mood off hota tha bs tere room mein chale jaao sb mast ho jata tha.  Bhai agar tu or chaman na hote toh campus life na jane kesi hoti  or bas jate jate tumse mein yahi sawal puchunga jo khudse main humesa puchta huu

कौन सी बात है तुम में ऐसी 
इतने अच्छे क्यूँ लगते हो
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Yo Aditya !
Tujhe sabse pehle toh Shashank wali video banane ke liye dhanyawad dena chahta huu ... Woh video hi hai jo last long college memory bani rahegi puri wing ki.  Yar tum kitna maje lete the uske...

Tere or Lehari ke sath Gangs of Wasseypur dekhna or naye dialogues ki galiyan sb kitna majedar tha.. Tu toh apna hai hi Tech Guy, or aalsi bhi  BC kabhi koi sports nahi khela wing walo ke sath. Ab bas college  mein milte hai kafi games khelnge GTA5 tere dabbe pr nahi ground pr or Placements mein tension lene ki jarurat hi nahi hai mujhe tu jo hai sath mein guide krne ke liye /\ . Ab bas placements khtam krke last year hai kafi maje krne hai. Take care bhai !!
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
"woooooo .... " boi
Hamari wing ka sport representative. Tere sath football khelna humesa miss karunga even mujhe khelna na aata ho ;).

Or woh ESO208A ka Assignment evaluation jeevan bhar yaad rahne wala hai .. HAHA. 
Or jab bhi ladkio ko discussion ho teri woh curious smile  with "" hmm mmm mmm " 

Maje karna or milte rahna !!
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Yo ML boy!!

Tujhe to main  boring samjhta tha lekin jab last days mein mile kafi majaa aayaa. Tere or jagga ke sath last day evening walk.  Teri youtube videos dhundhnaa majedaar tha. 
Time khatm ho raha last 28 sec 
Milte hai jab tu India aaye or trip pr chlte .
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Library ke bahar most needed sutte ke liye  or structure bhai tumne or Gandhi ne jyada padhaya tha lol. 
Best of luck man for the future ahead.
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Dhamake yaar saale kamse  kam yahaan toh  achhi DP lagata  :((. Great Mentor hai bhai tu or Woh football game 1 tip 1 shot yaar tu aaya nahi tha na abhi college bohot miss kia tha sabne tujhe. Koi bhi academic problem ho yaa maje marnaa ho tere sath badaa majaa aata hai. Antaragni mein tera Dance lol, Bohot jyada maje kiye hai tere room mein Mini Militia se Lekar discussions tk. Agar memoir mein  PHY101A naah hona toh yeh kabhi complete nahi hoga , TU toh janta hi hai kyu. Bas Maje krte rah or Milte rahna ;(
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Yo Kambhoj !

Tere bina civil k 4 saal soch b nahi sakta 
College ki labs report bhai teri wajah se hi bani hai or Group projects bhi, Tu na hota toh pakka lag jati courses mein. Thanks bhai for all the help.


P.S. Bsdk kam photo khichaya kr (- _- )
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Aelo Cheems !
Verma bsdk memoir b sahi se nahi likh sakta tha kya  ;). Aaj b woh incident yaad hai jab tu flash krke bhaag gaya the bandi ko xD. 
Tujhse bada madarchod maine campus kya life mein nahi dekhaa, sale ne senior ka cooler bech dala lol.
Cycle corridor mein khadi krnaa, hazaro tarah ki harkatein denaa pr fir bhi tere sath bohot majaa aaya kyu ki mere double meaning jokes or thinking ko tum hi samajh pate the. 
Woh Upmanyu ki comedy night wala scene jisme humne kand kiye the. Tumhare sath ki hui Daaru party ab tak ki sbse shandar thi. Woh Peg banana, fir tumhara 'kannu' ko miss krna  " O ma GO Turu lob " 
Mini miltia khelna, Cricket, cycle pr ghumne jana  or khashkar library mein porn dekhna lol.
Tu bohot hi mast hai re, milte rahnaa humesa or shadi toh tu hi karega sabse pehle group mein tab toh sab milenge hi ab bas next trip plan karo
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Lake chalenge
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Yo cool boy !

Kafi maje kiye hai bhai Prof. Nihar Ranjan Patra ki lab mein or courses toh nikal hi gaye the aese hi. 
Best of luck bhai future ke liye or milte rahna :)
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Paurwal bhai, not just a normal guy from IITK, Civil Gawd ho tum / \ . Tumne na jane kitne courses mein pass karwaya hai, yeh degree tumhari hi den hai or woh CCD ke sessions tum, samu or main. Best moments the woh bhai. Take care bhai.
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Lambo bhai,
Tumhare liye yeh incident ya woh memory yeh sab nahi likhunga. Jab b main down feel krta tha tu hi hai jisne motivate kia and that means a lot to me. Duniya or life ko dekhne ka nazariya badla hai tune mere liye. you are one of the person whose character influence me to become a better person. Aese hi hum logon ko drishti dete rahna or maje toh krte hi rahenge hum sab sath mein.

  Ab likh hi raha hu toh meri diary se teri kahi hui 2 line likhunga jo aaj b mujhe aage badhne k liye motivate krti hai. 

" तू पहला आदमी थोड़े ही है जो अपनी जिम्मेदारियों से भागना चाहता है | "  ~  Rohit Lambora
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Chaman mere Chaman !!

Bhai woh sare exams, quizzes, classes, projects sab there sath hi denaa . Tere notes se padh kr pass hona, exams me cheating krnaa or kya kuch nahi.. woh Endsem Nightouts, CCD mein janaa.Mujhe sach mein bada majaa aata tha  jis project pr hum sath kaam krte the chahe kesa b gaya ho

Begum, chaman or chuddu ka sath ghumna. Kitne sare incidents hai apan teeno ke ek sath.
Mera harkatein dena or tera maturely situations handle karnaa.
Incident yaad aa gaya in sabse, Us raat baarish ho rahi thi main library mein mag rahaa tha, tb tum, begum or main ghumne gaye the Doaa canteen ki taraf . Woh raat aaj b dil ko khush kr jati hai.

Goa mein tu, main, yadav or verma ka late night ghumna police dekh kar bhag jana, FIrangi  ka street  dance  or na jane kya kya. 

Agar aage kabhi mauka mila toh tere sath firse kisi project ya work pr kaam krna hai mujhe, Kyuki tere sath kaam krna kabhi kaam jesa lagaa hi nahi bs funny event ki tarah ho jata tha. Thanks Bhai for all the memories and in the last tere liye waseem bareilvi ki 2 lines-


"जहाँ रहेगा वहीं रौशनी लुटाएगा
 किसी चराग़ का अपना मकाँ नहीं होता "
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Ohooo Bihari, Discord ka sahi upyog koi seekhe tum se.  Tum kya sahi khelte ho har sport baddy, football, skating, basketball sab kuch or artist b, kese kar lete ho itna sab manage. Hope jaldi hi college khul jaye or tumse skating seekh paye. EK dum CHill bandaa, deadline k last din kaam krne wala /\ . Bihari the "lone wolf".
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Patil bhau ke sath after midnight discussions sabse majedar hote the...  carrier ko lekar, relationships ko or courses sab majedaar .  
Patil, main or amru bhaiyaa makes the best happening memory  for me after all the workload of day jab amru ke room mein use paresaan krna. 
Or ab toh milna hi hai last year mein bs patil bhau hi hai h daaru party ke liye.  
Take care brother.
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Jagga sir, 
Itna humble kese rah lete ho yeh raaz abhi tak nahi bataya tumne.   Woh football matches se lekar college k last days mein story telling tak .Oat mein phtoshoot wala kand or youtube pe tumhari videos dhundhnaa sab kitna majedaar tha.  Humesa aese hi  maje mein rahnaa.

P.S. "Tum aaye,  wing mein bahar aa gayi ".
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Hail Memelord Sachan !!
Bhai Woh antaragni mein sath mein kaam krna, PE mein fraud marna kitne sare moments share kiye humne pr BC ek b picture nahi li sath mein. Ab bs last year mein khub party krni hai, tab tak nahi rukna jabtak SIS khud aakar na bolde bhaiya thoda toh ruk jao lol. Jald hi college mein milte hai
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Mr. Dhaula, the silent person. 
Agar mein college photos dekhu naa toh 90% mein tu hi hai. Exams ke liye padhane se lekar exams mein pass krwane tk tu hi.  Tu or Lambo naa hote toh mera kya hota, Humesa help krne k liye ready rahne wala. Tere sath toh itni memories hai ki yeh samajh nahi aata konsi likhu pr 1 likhna toh banta hai kyu ki agar Jinda rahe or 50 saal baad reunion pr jab 1 baar fir yeh yearbook dekhe toh yaad aaye "Delhi Metro mein Goa wale kapde pehen kr kon ghumta hai (- - ) or woh topi ". Bas aese hi mast rahnaa
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Mian IITD mein milne se lekar IITK ke end tk, mera pehla college ka dost, or hamesa discussions or debate k liye ready rahne wala bandaa, woh Dance Extravanza yaad hai  tu main or patil jo upar baithe the or enjoy kiye the woh din aaj bhi yaad aata hai, Goa mein scooty chalanaa, or ghumne chalne k liye hamesa ready rahne wala, tera room agar nahi hota toh sb kahaan maje krte , Bas mian hamesa touch mein rahnaa
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Yo tpboss !!
Queries solve krne k liye humesa ready rahne wala banda !!
Kisi bhi tarah ki paresani ho tp ke pass solution ya solution dene wale kaa pataa hamesa mil jata hai.

Woh Late night discussions you know about what...  helps a lot in life . 

Tere sath bade maje kiye bas humesa ek dukh raha tu Dono trips pr nahi chalaa sath ;(. Ab next trip pr toh chalenge hi sab. 

Last days mein tu aaya badaa majaa aayaa bohot enjoy kia sabne,  is Naye TP ke sath " Free from CS work" . 

Tp boss tum bohot hi chill aadmi ho bs apne kaam ko jyada serious lelete ho jo bohot achhi baat hai pr ...  mujhe aage likhne ki jarurat nahi hai tum bohot samjhdar ho tum aage sab jante ho. Take care brother. Next trip pr milte hai.
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Sonkar bhai, Tumhare bina naa yeh sali Civil ki life bekar ho jati..  Jo labs mein maje, fraud marna or classes mein bakchodi se lekar tumhare gyan batna session or fundae denaa sab kuch bohot hi jyada achha tha .
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Vaibhav se tension free or chill banda campus mein koi nahi mila mujhe , Ek dum chill or mast aadmi apan sabne toh Jyada time Labs mein hi maje kiye hai Exams ke alava jahaan hume kuch aata nahi tha xD.
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Bhai agar tum naa hote toh yeh CIvil ki labs kitni boring ho jati. Vipul ke maje lenaa, patra ki lab mein or labs mein fraud sab kuch, kya maje kiye the. Utkarsh ke maje lol sab kuch kitna mast tha.  Woh din bade yaad aayenge.
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Yo baheti !

Kafi maje aaye Jagga or Avik ki youtube videos dhundhne mein, unhe  roast krne mein.  
Last sem yadgaar rahega :)
